TitleEnglish: Alma-chan Wants to Be a Family!
SummaryEnglish: She’s small. She’s sweet. She’s…capable of obliterating a tank in under three seconds?! Built by Enji and Suzume, two underappreciated genius scientists, Alma is the ultimate self-learning AI. There’s just one thing: She thinks they’re her mom and dad! Now as unexpected co-parents, the duo must hide their budding romantic feelings while taking on the messiest experiment of all: family life!
Aliases: 少女型兵器は家族になりたい
Shōjo-gata heiki < aruma-chan > wa kazoku ni naritai
Shoujo-gata heiki < aruma-chan > wa kazoku ni naritai
Shōjo-gata heiki wa kazoku ni naritai
Shoujo-gata heiki wa kazoku ni naritai
少女型兵器（アルマちゃん）は家族になりたい
Alma-chan Wants to Have a Family!

1.SummaryEnglish: A nearly-complete combat android insists on forming a nuclear family with the awkward geniuses who built her.

2.SummaryEnglish: After Alma surprises her 'parents' by making breakfast one day, Suzume decides to try her own hand at cooking.

3.SummaryEnglish: Alma decides to go to school after making friends with a girl she sees looking for lost puppies in the rain.
